committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to repeal section 3306 of title 5, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement of apportionment of appointments in the departmental service in the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Eliminates the requirement of apportionment of appointments in the departmental service in the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 3306 of title 5, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement of apportionment of appointments in the departmental service in the District of Columbia.
